name: io.github.84emllc/mcp-toggl
description: MCP server for Toggl Track time tracking integration with intelligent caching, reporting, and project/client management tools. Forked from verygoodplugins/mcp-toggl.

tools.name: toggl_check_auth
tools.description: Verify Toggl API connectivity and authentication is valid

tools.name: toggl_get_time_entries
tools.description: Get time entries with optional date range filters

tools.name: toggl_get_current_entry
tools.description: Get the currently running time entry, if any

tools.name: toggl_start_timer
tools.description: Start a new time entry timer

tools.name: toggl_create_entry
tools.description: Create a completed time entry with specific start and stop times

tools.name: toggl_stop_timer
tools.description: Stop the currently running timer

tools.name: toggl_daily_report
tools.description: Generate a daily report with hours by project and workspace

tools.name: toggl_weekly_report
tools.description: Generate a weekly report with daily breakdown and project summaries

tools.name: toggl_project_summary
tools.description: Get total hours per project for a date range

tools.name: toggl_workspace_summary
tools.description: Get total hours per workspace for a date range

tools.name: toggl_list_workspaces
tools.description: List all available workspaces

tools.name: toggl_list_projects
tools.description: List projects for a workspace

tools.name: toggl_list_clients
tools.description: List clients for a workspace

tools.name: toggl_create_client
tools.description: Create a new client in a workspace

tools.name: toggl_create_project
tools.description: Create a new project in a workspace

tools.name: toggl_update_project
tools.description: Update an existing project (rename, change client, archive, etc.)

tools.name: toggl_update_time_entry
tools.description: Update an existing time entry (change project, description, tags, times, etc.)

tools.name: toggl_delete_time_entry
tools.description: Delete a time entry

tools.name: toggl_warm_cache
tools.description: Pre-fetch and cache workspace, project, and client data

tools.name: toggl_cache_stats
tools.description: Get cache statistics and performance metrics

tools.name: toggl_clear_cache
tools.description: Clear all cached data
